summary.value: What we seek is to help people, not words of appreciation.

system.description:
ALSO: Champion, Chosen One, Savior

Often written in legends, a Hero is the embodiment of light and hope in a land plagued by darkness and despair. Together with their fellow companions, heroes travel the world seeking to help people in need and defeat forces of evil. Their only true reward, is maybe one day being remembered by those whose lives they impacted.

HERO FREE BENEFITS

  • Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points by 5.

  • Gain the ability to equip martial shields, and choose one: gain the ability to equip martial melee weapons; or gain the ability to equip martial ranged weapons.

HERO SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.MCrVhNlP4jbzdJi6]{A Hero's Purpose} (SL3)

Once per session, when you save one or more NPCs from danger, complete a quest for one or more NPCs, or one or more Villains reach 0 Ultima Points while you are present on the scene, you gain 【SL】 Fabula Points.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.4NcCRrGyuuOrgI8J]{It Was Destiny}

Once per session, you may spend a Fabula Point to create a new Bond towards someone or something, or add an emotion to one of your existing Bonds; this doesn’t require an action, but during a conflict it can only be done on your turn, while no effect is being resolved. Explain how destiny affected your relationships!

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.qg39quSjbKuvHLPo]{Power Of Friendship} (SL2)

You gain a number of extra Bond slots equal to 【SL】 .

Additionally, when you invoke a Bond to improve the Accuracy Check of an attack, that attack deals extra damage equal to 【the strength of that Bond】 .

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.iIBms0agbwthfoEz]{Resolve} (SL5)

During a conflict, you may use an action and spend a Fabula Point to recover from all status effects and also recover 【10 + (SL x 10)】 Mind Points.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.89brp9KWRYdJlvgZ]{Ties That Bind} (SL5)

When you invoke a Bond, you may choose an ally present on the scene: they recover 【SL x 4】 Hit Points or Mind points (your choice). If the Bond you invoked is with the ally you chose, that ally instead recovers both 【SL x 4】 it Points and Mind Points.

HEROIC SKILLS

“Mastery of the Hero Class” is included in the Requirements of the following existing Heroic Skills: Disarming Rhetoric, Heroic Companion, and Unbreakable (Core Rulebook, pages 235, 236 and 240, respectively), Arcane Soldier (Techno Fantasy Atlas, page 171), and Brave Bash and Cheer Up! (Natural Fantasy Atlas, page 163).

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.lrhl1WGyjTLvgV3B]{Fabula Impetum}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.DmzhRK2b6wNM1MKN]{Heroic Aura}
